import React, { Component } from "react"; export default class OpenProgram extends Component { state={ coordinator:[], } handleCoordinator = (event)=>{ const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const id = target._id; this.setState({ [name]: id, }); } handlechange = (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const value = target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value, }); }; render() { return (
